Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Olla
Chief of Police -- Town of Tullos
PW Fantasy Sports -- Authorize Fantasy Sports Contests - Act 322, 2018
Race.SummaryText: PROPOSITION TO AUTHORIZE FANTASY SPORTS CONTESTS.
Race.FullText: Shall fantasy sports contests be permitted in the parish of LaSalle?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition (Council on Aging) -- 1 Mill Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Council on Aging Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of one (1) mill on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $80,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of providing funds to the LaSalle Council on Aging to match Federal and State funds allocated to LaSalle Parish for services to the elderly, including the establishment and maintenance of centers for senior citizens?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Ambulance Service Dist. No. 1 -- 5 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Ambulance Service District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Ambulance Service District No. 1 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $398,750 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating ambulance service for the District, including acquiring equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 1 -- 9.53 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a nine and fifty-three hundredths (9.53) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $58,130 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030 for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 4 -- 10 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 4 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029 (an estimated $53,960 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 7 -- 10 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 7 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029 (an estimated $120,060 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 9 -- 10 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 9 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029 (an estimated $46,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads and bridges within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. #5 -- 5.07 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall LaSalle Recreation District #5 of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District") levy a five and seven hundredths (5.07) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $60,840 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities and equipment, including necessary land and buildings, for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. #10 -- 15.62 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the LaSalle Recreation District #10 of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a fifteen and sixty-two hundredths (15.62) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029 (an estimated $76,540 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Summerville-Rosefield Vol. Fire Dist. -- 20.05 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Summerville-Rosefield Volunteer Fire District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Summerville-Rosefield Volunteer Fire District, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twenty and five hundredths (20.05) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029 (an estimated $123,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Little Creek-Searcy Vol. Fire. Dist. -- 20 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Little Creek-Searcy Volunteer Fire District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Little Creek-Searcy Volunteer Fire District, LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twenty (20) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029 (an estimated $76,034 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment for the District and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
